author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Branding And Social Media Integration Boost For Abu Dhabi Events ListingsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Branding And Social Media Integration Boost For Abu Dhabi Events Listings
Abu Dhabi Tourism & Culture Authority (TCA Abu Dhabi) has unveiled a refreshed look and feel for its abudhabievents.ae online resource bringing a series of new features to the emirate’s leading event listings site.
The eye-catching, colourful, fresh new look is designed to attract attention and generate increased public engagement to improve ease of access to discover what is happening across the emirate of Abu Dhabi.
“We have rolled out the refreshed look and feel to ensure the site continues to use innovative digital techniques to reflect the diversity of daily events happening across the entire Emirate of Abu Dhabi,” said Mouza Al Shamsi, Acting Executive Director Marketing & Communications, TCA Abu Dhabi.
The new AbuDhabiEvents branding look-and-feel is being released across the project’s website, social media channels, flyers, advertisements and all its promotional materials.
“While the visibility of the website’s content has been aesthetically improved to aid navigation, it’s the new technological features beneath the surface which are designed to stimulate increased usage where the real improvements have been made, with enhancements for stakeholders to directly link to their social media feeds and upload their own events to ensure that the public can discover more about what’s on, where and when,” added Al Shamsi.
Source:- Abu Dhabi Tourism
